title: 1 dead, 3 injured after triple shooting in nightclub parking lot
content:
HOUSTON - One man has died and three other men are in critical condition after a fight Saturday morning inside a nightclub turned deadly in the parking lot.
The incident was reported at 1:45 a.m. in the 3500 block of Fannin Street.
WATCH LIVE: Harriet the bald eagle's eggs hatched Saturday morning
Police said several men inside the Life Night Club started fighting. The men took their fight outside where they began shooting at each other, officials said.
One of the men ran to a nearby parking garage to take cover from the gunfire, while the other three were injured and found in the parking lot of the night club, police said.
One victim, Kionn Oniel Lamothe, 25 was taken to a hospital where he was pronounced dead, police said.
Three other victims suffered from gunshot wounds and were taken to a hospital for treatment.
No charges have been filed or arrest made.
The shooting is under investigation.
Anyone with information in this case is asked to contact the Houston Police Department homicide division at 713-308-3600 or Crime Stoppers at 713-222-TIPS.
2016 Click2Houston/KPRC2
